title: Secrets of Great Rainmakers: The Keys to Success and Wealth
description: In Secrets of Great Rainmakers , you'll learn how to outsmart the competition and set yourself apart from the pack. In over 50 interviews with industry leaders from a wide variety of fields, bestselling author Jeffrey J. Fox will share the proven techniques and hard-won wisdom that have helped great rainmakers get ahead, along with his trademark brand of counterintuitive insight and commentary that have made his books so popular.
author: Jeffrey J. Fox
